titleStmt.title: Expedients proposed for the easing and advantaging the coal-trade, and lessning the price of coals in London, and other places, &c.
titleStmt.author: Middleton, Thomas, fl. 1670.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Includes: "The town of Newcastles answer to the proposals above-mentioned" and "The reply to the answer of Newcastle."
Reproduction of original in the Boston Public Library.
